front.title: An Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) Usage for Presence Lists

abstract.t: This document describes a usage of the Extensible Markup Language(XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) for manipulating lists ofpresentities (also known as buddy lists or rosters). It does so byspecifying an XML Schema that contains a list of presentities that auser is interested in watching.
